CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 10, 1966, pg. 1B reads: "In Santa's Arms - These cute three-year-olds, filled Santa's ears with requests for toys that they want him to bring them for Christmas. They are Cheryl Beaman and Michelle Bonner."
TitMainTitle: Double exposure: Santa Claus seated in gothic chair between reindeer, talking to Cheryl Beaman and Michelle Bonner gathered in Toyland on ninth floor of Kaufmann's Department Store; Display of dolls in Toyland on ninth floor of Kaufmann's Department Store
